approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller’s account to the specified recipient.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

burn.description: Burns tokens from the caller’s account.

burnFrom.description: Burns tokens from a specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used to get the user representation of the token.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance of a spender.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance of a spender.

minter.description: Returns the address of the minter.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce of the specified address.

owner.description: Returns the address of the owner.

pendingOwner.description: Returns the address of the pending owner.

permit.description: Allows to permit a spender to spend tokens on behalf of the owner with EIP-2612.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership to a new address.
